Estimate the time varying R0 - using EpiEstim

estimate_R0.Rd

Estimate the time varying R0 - using EpiEstim

estimate_R0(
  cases = NULL,
  serial_intervals = NULL,
  rt_prior = NULL,
  window = NULL,
  si_samples = 100,
  rt_samples = 100
)

Arguments

cases

A dataframe containing a list of local cases with the following variables: date, cases, and import_status
serial_intervals

A matrix with columns representing samples and rows representing the probability of the serial intervel being on that day.
rt_prior

A list defining the reproduction number prior containing the mean (mean_prior) and standard deviation (std_prior)
window

Numeric, the window over which to estimate time-varying R
si_samples

Numeric, the number of samples to take from the serial intervals supplied
rt_samples

Numeric, the number of samples to take from the estimated R distribution for each time point.

Value

A tibble containing the date and summarised R estimte.

Examples

  • Value
